text: The Women's 10 kilometre cross-country skiing event was part of the cross- country skiing programme at the 1988 Winter Olympics, in Calgary, Canada. It was the tenth appearance of the event. The competition was held on 14 February 1988, at the Canmore Nordic Centre. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" ! Rank !! Name !! Country !!
